full_output.summary: Currently pursuing B.Tech in Computer Science and Engineering at SRM University AP, passionate about Computer Science, real-time problem-solving, and web technologies. Particularly intrigued by Data Science and eager to explore the latest trends in this field. Committed to continuous self-improvement through self-learning and collaborative efforts with peers and mentors.

projects.name: Food Order System
projects.description: Developed a food order management system utilizing MySQL, HTML, and CSS. Integrated user authentication, menu display, order placement, and management functionalities. Ensured data security, responsive design, and user friendly website.

projects.name: Digital Clock
projects.description: Developed a Python Digital Clock using tkinter for a visually appealing real-time display of hours, minutes, and seconds. Applied event-driven programming for dynamic updates, highlighting expertise in Python and GUI development.

projects.name: 2048 Game
projects.description: Developed a C++ implementation of the 2048 game, focusing on efficient tile movement, merging logic, and user interaction via a console interface. Demonstrated strong problem-solving and programming skills through this project.

experiences.description: Assist in data collection, analysis, and visualization projects to support business decision-making processes. Collaborate with senior data scientists to develop predictive models and derive actionable insights.
Developed responsive and user-friendly front end E-commerce website using HTML, CSS, and JavaScript.
